longDef.en: to finish doing something that you were doing

examples.en: Once I start eating chocolate, I can't stop.
examples.cn: 我一开始吃巧克力，就停不了嘴了。

examples.en: Stop shouting - you're giving me a headache!
examples.cn: 别再叫了——你搞得我头都疼了！

examples.en: I couldn't stop laughing.
examples.cn: 我忍不住笑个没完。

examples.en: Stop it!/Stop that!
examples.cn: 住手！

examples.en: My watch must have stopped.
examples.cn: 我的表一定是停了。

examples.en: The air conditioner has stopped working.
examples.cn: 空调停了。

longDef.en: to not move any more or to make someone or something not move any more

examples.en: Stop the car, I want to get out!
examples.cn: 把车停下，我要下去！

examples.en: I heard him shout, "Stop, or I'll shoot!"
examples.cn: 我听到他大叫：“停下，否则我就开枪了！”

longDef.en: to finish doing something that you do regularly or as a habit
longDef.cn: 戒除，停止（常做的事或习惯）

examples.en: Apparently she's stopped drinking.
examples.cn: 听说她戒酒了。

examples.en: I stopped seeing him last year.
examples.cn: 去年我和他分手了。

longDef.en: to pause for a short time while travelling or during an activity

examples.en: Does this train stop at Finsbury Park?
examples.cn: 本次列车在芬斯伯里公园停吗？

examples.en: Why don't you just stop somewhere and ask for directions?
examples.cn: 为什么你不找个地方停一下问问路呢？

examples.en: I stopped to pick up a letter that I'd dropped.
examples.cn: 我停下脚步，捡起我掉在地上的信。

longDef.en: to prevent someone from doing something

examples.en: If she really wants to leave, I don't understand what's stopping her.
examples.cn: 如果她真的想走，我不明白有什么事绊住了她。

examples.en: They've put barriers up to stop people (from) getting through.
examples.cn: 他们筑起了街垒，阻止人们通行。

examples.en: Something must be done to stop the fighting.
examples.cn: 必须做点儿什么来制止争斗。

longDef.en: to tell your bank not to deal with a cheque that you have written, so that the money is not paid from your bank account

examples.en: Are you coming with me or are you stopping here?
examples.cn: 你是和我一起走还是就留在这儿？

examples.en: I can't stop - Marc is waiting for me outside.
examples.cn: 我不能再呆了——马克在外面等着我呢。

examples.en: Now that you're here, why don't you stop for some tea?
examples.cn: 既然你已经来了，为什么不留下来喝杯茶呢？

examples.en: I've been out every night this week, so I thought I'd stop in (= stay at home) tonight.
examples.cn: 这个星期我每个晚上都在外面，所以今晚想呆在家里。

examples.en: We stopped up (= did not go to bed) until two o'clock last night watching the late film.
examples.cn: 我们昨晚看晚场电影，一直熬到两点才睡。

examples.en: We stopped (up) the gap with some rags.
examples.cn: 我们用些破布塞住了豁口。

longDef.en: the act of stopping an activity or journey, or a period of time when you stop
longDef.cn: 停止，终止;逗留，停留;停留时间

examples.en: Please remain in your seat until the plane comes to a complete stop.
examples.cn: 请在飞机停稳前留在自己的座位上。

examples.en: We'd have been here sooner, but we made several stops along the way.
examples.cn: 我们本来可以早点儿到这儿的，但我们中途停了好几次。

examples.en: At the beginning of the project there were a lot of stops and starts.
examples.cn: 项目开始的时候，有很多磕磕绊绊。

longDef.en: a place where vehicles, especially buses, stop in order to allow passengers to get off and on

examples.en: a bus stop
examples.cn: 公交车站

examples.en: I'm getting off at the next stop.
examples.cn: 我下一站下车。

examples.en: Is this our stop (= where we must get off)?
examples.cn: 我们是这一站下吗？

longDef.en:
short form of
full stop UK

a 
plosive  (= consonant that is made by completely stopping the flow of air)
to stop an unpleasant, unwanted activity or habit from continuing

examples.en: He used to smoke in bed when I first got to know him, but I soon put a stop to that!
examples.cn: 我刚认识他的时候，他总是躺在床上抽烟，但我很快就让他改掉了！
